entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
